TrainingRegimes package

Submodules

TrainingRegimes.TargetRegime module

class TrainingRegimes.TargetRegime.TargetRegime(tolerance_distance: float, max_time: float, reward_distance_coefficient: float, reward_distance_exp: float, reward_distance_max: float, reward_goal: float, reward_velocity_coefficient: float, reward_velocity_exp: float, reward_velocity_max: float, penalty_time: float, penalty_crash: float, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: _BaseRegime

This class represents the environment for a drone going to a target. It inherits from the _BaseDroneEnv class. The drone’s goal is to reach a target. The simulation ends when the drone hits the ground, the time exceeds the maximum time, or the drone reaches the goal. The drone receives rewards based on its distance to the target, its velocity, and whether it has reached the goal. It receives penalties for time and crashing into the floor.

Parameters:

  • mode – The mode of the environment. Either “hover” or “target”.

  • tolerance_distance – The maximum distance from the target to end the simulation

  • max_time – The longest the simulation can go on for (seconds)

  • reward_distance_coefficient – Coefficient for the reward based on the distance to the target.

  • reward_distance_exp – Exponent for the reward based on the distance to the target.

  • reward_distance_max – Maximum reward based on the distance to the target.

  • reward_goal – Reward for reaching the goal.

  • reward_velocity_coefficient – Coefficient for the reward based on the drone’s velocity.

  • reward_velocity_exp – Exponent for the reward based on the drone’s velocity.

  • penalty_time – Penalty for time.

  • penalty_crash – Penalty for crashing.

  • kwargs – Additional arguments for the base class.

property done: bool

Check if the simulation is done.

Returns:

True if the drone hit the ground, the simulation is truncated, or the goal is reached, otherwise False.

property goal_reached: bool

Check if the goal is reached.

Returns:

True if the distance to the target is less than the tolerance distance, otherwise False.

property metrics: dict[str, Any]

Get the metrics of the current state.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the current metrics.

property reward: float

Calculate the total reward.

Returns:

The total reward.

property reward_crash: float

Calculate the crash penalty.

Returns:

The crash penalty if the drone hit the ground, otherwise 0.

property reward_distance: float

Calculate the reward based on the distance to the target. If the norm of the drone target vector is 0, return the maximum reward.

Returns:

The reward based on the distance to the target.

property reward_goal: float

Calculate the reward for reaching the goal.

Returns:

The reward for reaching the goal if the goal is reached, otherwise 0.

property reward_time: float

Calculate the time penalty.

Returns:

The time penalty.

property reward_velocity: float

Calculate the reward based on the drone’s velocity.

Returns:

The reward based on the drone’s velocity.

property truncated: bool

Check if the simulation is truncated.

Returns:

True if the simulation time exceeds the maximum time, otherwise False.
